mdRecord.dcterms:title: That Outfit Never Could Score
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leasure, Al
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Look! Even their mascot is disgusted!""He should be!""I hope someone has insurance on this outfit!""I'm just the quarterback! I'm not supposed to carry the ball!"(Responsible state gov't!)"I'm not ready!""And I never did know the signals!""Coach if we want a winner put Rush Holt in there! He knows how to carry the ball!""That outfit never could score!"(Matt) (Homer) (Bill) (Pat) (Fumble A.C.)(Voter)
The cartoon features various influential members of the Democratic party.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American
Cartoons (Commentary)
Holt, Rush Dew, 1905-1955
Politics and government
West Virginia
